channel.title: CVE Feed for fastify -- fastify
channel.description: The latest CVEs for fastify -- fastify

item.title: CVE-2022-39288|2024-08-03T12:00:43.799Z -- fastify -- fastify
item.description: fastify is a fast and low overhead web framework, for Node.js. Affected versions of fastify are subject to a denial of service via malicious use of the Content-Type header. An attacker can send an invalid Content-Type header that can cause the application to crash. This issue has been addressed in commit `fbb07e8d` and will be included in release version 4.8.1. Users are advised to upgrade. Users unable to upgrade may manually filter out http content with malicious Content-Type headers.
